amendatorysection.catchline: Hog cholera serum; licensed by United States Department of Agriculture; manufacture, sell, offer for sale, use, possess, distribute; exception.
amendatorysection.para: It shall be lawful to manufacture, sell, offer for sale, use, possess and distribute hog cholera serum in this state so long as the production thereof is licensed by the United States Department of Agriculture and the serum produced is released for sale and use by the United States Department of Agriculture and the serum is not impotent or contaminated with disease-producing or other harmful bacteria or substance; Provided, that no person shall manufacture hog cholera serum in the State of Nebraska without first securing a manufacturer's permit from the Department of Agriculture of this state.
